title: @RiotBioluminescense!
body:
Ok so I know that maps about main universe Runeterra being in the works and that it's difficult and all.  But what about SG Runeterra?  Is there any info on that universe?

Is every major nation just another school or city?

I love SG and this is kind of important to me.  Particularly my fanfiction of
{{champion:163}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:142}} {{champion:141}} {{champion:145}} .

replies.body:
I know less about the alt canon settings like PROJECT or Star Guardian, but I do know that the Star Guardian game mode was set in Valoran City Park, and the story Starfall features the Guardians going to Camp Targon.  That suggests that regions and locations in the main Runeterra canon don't have to just correspond to cities or schools - they can be camps, parks, and other places too!

Not sure if there are more locations mentioned - like I said, I am not as caught up on my Star Guardian lore as others (despite being lead designer on the recent Thunderdome minigame [Star Guardian: Insomnia](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/Jxe4yLtG-download-the-3-minigames-we-made-in-48-hours-with-your-input-team-jam-packed-thunderdome-xi).  \*blatent plugging intensifies* )

Off-topic: I loved Insomnia, but I was shocked I never saw a legitimate Touhou-project style Finale Funkeln from Lux.  Other than that ONE caveat, it was really fun.  I enjoyed the games a lot.
{{sticker:sg-lux}}

> [{quoted}](name=Larriet,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ec8nLvm8,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2018-04-05T22:47:44.184+0000)
>
> Off-topic: I loved Insomnia, but I was shocked I never saw a legitimate Touhou-project style Finale Funkeln from Lux.  Other than that ONE caveat, it was really fun.  I enjoyed the games a lot.
> {{sticker:sg-lux}}

Did you spot the little secret cameos?  

I don't think anyone did, but in the foreground, in silhouette, there are two of the other Star Guardians just chilling out, and a cat.  It's so very hard to spot them because they zip past so fast and your brain aggressively tries to filter them out while you play.  Easiest to see them when watching a youtube video of the level :)

They were fun to add in at the last minute though!
... Well, now I have to play it again.  What.  A.  Shame.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ec8nLvm8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-03T17:08:02.700+0000)
>
> I know less about the alt canon settings like PROJECT or Star Guardian, but I do know that the Star Guardian game mode was set in Valoran City Park, and the story Starfall features the Guardians going to Camp Targon.  That suggests that regions and locations in the main Runeterra canon don't have to just correspond to cities or schools - they can be camps, parks, and other places too!
> 
> Not sure if there are more locations mentioned - like I said, I am not as caught up on my Star Guardian lore as others (despite being lead designer on the recent Thunderdome minigame [Star Guardian: Insomnia](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/Jxe4yLtG-download-the-3-minigames-we-made-in-48-hours-with-your-input-team-jam-packed-thunderdome-xi).  \*blatent plugging intensifies* )

I for one like to think that in the SG universe all of what we know of as Runeterra in more compact into a smaller area. So like instead of Targon being a mountain with entire civilization it's maybe like a camp and a surrounding village.

TLDR: Runeterra is now Japan

Hmmmm...

I forgot the camp was called Targon, but i do remember there being a sign about the stars there.  What is wrong with me...

Anyways thanks!

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

The city that the SG were in looked like the best place in League so far

https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/LOL_CMS_130_Article_01-min.jpg

Where's the link to the fanfiction though?

Its nkt finished yet! >.<
